Html:
Hi Guys,

Is there any simple example for mvvm with mef using prism? i tried training kit but was not so helpful.

 

thanks

 

sirfmemon

Hi sirfmemon,

You might find useful the MVVM Reference Implementation provided with Prism here.

The aforementioned solution demonstrates how to build an application that implements the MVVM presentation pattern. It also uses MEF to create both Views and ViewModels, so you can see the use of the presentation pattern and along with MEF.

Also, you might find handy the following links:

  • Chapter 2: Initializing Prism Applications
  • Chapter 3: Managing Dependencies Between Components
  • Chapter 5: Implementing the MVVM Pattern

 

I hope you find this information useful.

Thanks,

Miguel Bronzovic
http://blogs.southworks.net/mbronzovic
